i18n.author: Author
i18n.name: Name
i18n.short_description_of_this: A short description of this bulletin board (shown at the top of every page).
i18n.subject: Subject
i18n.title: Title
i18n.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this?
i18n.bad_request: Bad request. The link you followed is incorrect or outdated.
i18n.no_view: You do not have permission to view these forums.
i18n.no_permission: You do not have permission to access this page.
i18n.invalid_email: The e-mail address you entered is invalid.
i18n.invalid_registration: The registration information you entered is invalid.
i18n.required_field: is a required field in this form.
i18n.new_posts_info: Go to the first new post in this topic.
i18n.subject: Subject
i18n.author: Author
i18n.title: Title
i18n.show_new_posts: Show new posts since last visit
i18n.warning: Warning! If this is the first post in the topic, the whole topic will be deleted.
i18n.request_pass_legend: Enter the e-mail address with which you registered
i18n.request_pass_info: A new password together with a link to activate the new password will be sent to that address.
i18n.enter_username: Enter your username and password below
i18n.login_info: If you have not registered or have forgotten your password click on the appropriate link below.
i18n.already_subscribed: You are already subscribed to this topic.
i18n.not_subscribed: You are not subscribed to this topic.
i18n.delete_topics_comply: Are you sure you want to delete the selected topics?
i18n.delete_posts_comply: Are you sure you want to delete the selected posts?
i18n.edit_post_legend: Edit the post and submit changes
i18n.pass_key_bad: The specified password activation key was incorrect or has expired. Please re-request a new password. If that fails, contact the forum administrator at
i18n.pass_updated: Your password has been updated. You can now login with your new password.
i18n.change_pass_legend: Enter and confirm your new password
i18n.email_key_bad: The specified e-mail activation key was incorrect or has expired. Please re-request change of e-mail address. If that fails, contact the forum administrator at
i18n.email_updated: Your e-mail address has been updated.
i18n.activate_email_sent: An email has been sent to the specified address with instructions on how to activate the new e-mail address. If it doesn't arrive you can contact the forum administrator at
i18n.email_instructions: An e-mail will be sent to your new address with an activation link. You must click the link in the e-mail you receive to activate the new address.
i18n.unknown_failure: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
i18n.dupe_username: Someone else has already registered with that username. Please go back and try a different username.
i18n.signature_info: A signature is a small piece of text that is attached to your posts. In it, you can enter just about anything you like. Perhaps you would like to enter your favourite quote or your star sign. It's up to you! In your signature you can use BBCode if it is allowed in this particular forum. You can see the features that are allowed/enabled listed below whenever you edit your signature.
i18n.no_sig: No signature currently stored in profile.
i18n.instructions: When you update your profile, you will be redirected back to this page.
i18n.delete_warning: Warning! Deleted users and/or posts cannot be restored. If you choose not to delete the posts made by this user, the posts can only be deleted manually at a later time.
i18n.delete_posts: Delete any posts and topics this user has made.
i18n.no_new_regs: This forum is not accepting new registrations.
i18n.rules_legend: You must agree to the following in order to register
i18n.username_dupe_1: Someone is already registered with the username
i18n.email_not_match: E-mail addresses do not match. Please go back and correct.
i18n.reg_email: Thank you for registering. Your password has been sent to the specified address. If it doesn't arrive you can contact the forum administrator at
i18n.reg_complete: Registration complete. Logging in and redirecting
i18n.reg_desc_1: Registration will grant you access to a number of features and capabilities otherwise unavailable. These functions include the ability to edit and delete posts, design your own signature that accompanies your posts and much more. If you have any questions regarding this forum you should ask an administrator.
i18n.reg_desc_2: Below is a form you must fill out in order to register. Once you are registered you should visit your profile and review the different settings you can change. The fields below only make up a small part of all the settings you can alter in your profile.
i18n.username_legend: Please enter a username between 2 and 25 characters long
i18n.pass_legend_1: Please enter and confirm your chosen password
i18n.pass_info: Passwords can be between 4 and 16 characters long. Passwords are case sensitive.
i18n.email_info: You must enter a valid e-mail address as your randomly generated password will be sent to that address.
i18n.is_subscribed: You are currently subscribed to this topic
i18n.copyright: Copyright Savonix Corporation, authored by Albert Lash. Based on Punbb, written by Rickard Andersson
i18n.name_of_new_category: The name of the new category you want to add. You can edit the name of the category later (see below). Go to
i18n.to_add_forums: to add forums to your new category
i18n.select_the_name_of: Select the name of the category you want to delete. You will be asked to confirm your choice of category for deletion before it is deleted
i18n.name: Name
i18n.select_category_to_add: Select the category to which you wish to add a new forum
i18n.title_of_bulletin_board: The title of this bulletin board (shown at the top of every page).
i18n.email_of_forum_admin: The e-mail address of the forum administrator
i18n.address_all_email_sent_from: This is the address that all e-mails sent by the forum will be addressed from
i18n.enable_users_to_subscribe: Enable users to subscribe to topics (recieve e-mail when someone replies)
i18n.address_of_external_smtp: The address of an external SMTP server to send e-mails with. You can specify a custom port number if the SMTP server doesn't run on the default port 25 (example: mail.myhost.com:3580). Leave blank to use the local mail program
i18n.controls_whether_forum_accepts_new_regis: Controls whether this forum accepts new registrations. Disable only under special circumstances
i18n.when_enabled_users_are_emailed: When enabled, users are e-mailed a random password when they register. They can then log in and change the password in their profile if they see fit. This feature also requires users to verify new e-mail addresses if they choose to change from the one they registered with. This is an effective way of avoiding registration abuse and making sure that all users have "correct" e-mail addresses in their profiles
i18n.when_enabled_users_must: When enabled, users must agree to a set of rules when registering (enter text below). The rules will always be available through a link in the navigation table at the top of every page
i18n.here_you_can_enter_any_rules: Here you can enter any rules or other information that the user must review and accept when registering. If you enabled rules above you have to enter something here, otherwise it will be disabled. This text will not be parsed like regular posts and thus may contain HTML
